message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it's fantastic and I know you'll get a lot of use out of it. I'm asking for $120 to start. What do you think?
I think the product is interesting, but I was hoping to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm confident in the value of this product. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I'm still not sure if I'm willing to pay that much. I'd be willing to pay $95 for the product.
